title: Raiders year!
content: After last years disappointment, the raiders are going all the way this year

title: Storm may be struggling
content: With a few player losses and others arguing with the coach the storm may be struggling this year!

title: Knights have a hot start
content: A great win over the roosters gave the knights the start to the season they need

title: Bunnies have a poor start
content: Losing two of two is not the start the bunnies would have wanted

title: Can the panthers do a repeat?
content: After last years final success can Penrith do it again

title: Bulldogs get a good away win
content: The new signings are paying off for the bulldogs who got a good win over last seasons fellow strugglers the cowboys

title: I'm waiting for the Dolphins
content: Who cares about this year, its all about Wayne and the Dolphins next season

title: Why is there another team in Brisbane
content: Should bring one to South Australia and Adelaide!
